amendment.description: An amendment comprised of the following amendments printed in Part G of House Report 116-438 as en bloc No. 6: Nos. 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, and 8.
amendment.purpose: Amendments en bloc comprised of amendments numbered 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, and 8, printed in part G of House Report 116-438.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Graves (MO) amendments Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 179 - 241 (Roll no. 134).

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A007) pursuant to the rule.
